text: @PeterStefanovi2 Leader is not a word that should be associated with him. He has shown no leadership before or after the coronavirus. Joke of a politician who should have stuck to Have I Got News For You.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Have I Got News for You
entity.description: Celebrity contestants find themselves in the hot seat as they are quizzed on the latest news. The programme consists of several rounds, including the film round, the tabloid headlines round, the odd one out round and the missing words round. Originally presented by Angus Deayton, the show has relied on guest hosts since 2002, while Ian Hislop and Paul Merton serve as the team captains. `Have I Got News for You' was awarded the Lifetime Achievement Award at the 2011 British Comedy Awards, the first time that the honour has been awarded to a collective rather than an individual or double-act.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
